candidates.title: Set a per-command ioctl version in device-mapper header
candidates.body:
Adopt the approach taken by libdevmapper and use a table to determine
the correct ioctl interface version to specify for each possible ioctl
command.

This allows devicemapper-rs to function with a broader range of kernels
since it will only request a higher ioctl version number from the kernel
when issuing a command that requires it and avoids failures in CI test
environments where devicemapper-rs may be built with newer device-mapper
features than are supported by the running kernel.

candidates.title: Add git hooks, clean up Makefile, and fix clippy errors
Also specify patch version for dependency
Rename devicemapper-rs-sys to be consistent with devicemapper on crates.io

repo.name: devicemapper-rs
